IEP_Template_Age3_SpecialNeed.question: How does the student respond when called by name?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student responds 80% of the time when called by name.

IEP_Template_Age3_SpecialNeed.question: Can the student sit on a chair for more than 5 minutes?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can sit for more than 5 minutes.

IEP_Template_Age3_SpecialNeed.question: How does the student handle complex sentences, both in understanding and speaking?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can understand and say complex sentences.

IEP_Template_Age3_SpecialNeed.question: Does the student require 1-on-1 attention in school?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can participate in group activities without requiring 1-on-1 attention.

IEP_Template_Age3_SpecialNeed.question: Is the student able to follow simple directions?

benchmark.qualificationText: Goal is met if the student can follow simple directions.
